mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM (SELECT o.*, m.m_name, order_nb_title(o.o_order_num) nb_title , (SELECT COUNT(nb_num) FROM order_detail od WHERE o.o_order_num = od.o_order_num) o_book_count FROM orderr o, member m WHERE o.m_num = m.m_num(+) ORDER BY o.o_order_date DESC ) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT o.*, m.m_name, m.m_id, m.m_ph, order_nb_title(o.o_order_num) nb_title, order_nb_price(o.o_order_num) o_order_price , (SELECT SUM(o_de_count) FROM order_detail od WHERE o.o_order_num = od.o_order_num) o_order_count , (SELECT COUNT(nb_num) FROM order_detail od WHERE o.o_order_num = od.o_order_num) o_book_count FROM orderr o, member m WHERE o.m_num = m.m_num(+) AND o_order_num = #{o_order_num}
